title: Pixel 3 not turning on and not charging anymore
content:
Two days ago my Pixel 3 didn't turn on anymore, nor it can be charged. It is not good, because I didn't have a backup and I have important data on my phone.

I am a big fan o Google products, both software and hardware, but this issue makes me reluctant to buy more of it's products. 

Please, help me out with this matter.

Kind regards,
Robert
